Summary: The sun was going down and something silver caught my eye.
divs: Sighting Details I was driving through the Mobil home park where I live heading to the store.The Sun was just going down and some thing silver caught my eye.I looked up and saw something really strange.At first I thought it was a hot air balloon,but it wasn't. this was at least 20 times bigger then a hot air balloon.It was really big.It was way up in the clouds at about 2 o clock,1200 oclock being stright up. I pulled over and stopped to watch it.The top of it was Silver,and the middle was BLack and slowly faded to a Red on the bottom.It moved very fast and this will sound weird but it looked like a giant top.I could not get over how big it was.I live behind a small Airport,and use to live behind March air force base,and know what different types of air planes look like.This was no airplane,or no Blimp.It is the biggest thing I have ever seen in the air. The next day the air force put out a news report that a circus lost a big balloon that was Pink and was a pig that was 2 stories high.This was no pig,and if it was,it must have been set up with jet engines to move as fast as it was going.I watched it for about 3 minutes until it went out of sight. The balloon thing the Airforce put out sounds nice except this was flying opposite of the wind.I don't believe anything they say anyway. I wish I would have had a camera with me but unfortunately I didn't. Well I'll keep watching and hope it comes by again. Paul<><
